00038 void libless_parameters_init(libless_params_t *parameters) {
00039         parameters->group1 = NULL;
00040         parameters->group2 = NULL;
00041         parameters->generator1 = NULL;
00042         parameters->generator2 = NULL;
00043         parameters->public = NULL;
00044         parameters->pairing = NULL;
00045         parameters->prime = NULL;
00046         parameters->factor = NULL;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void libless_parameters_clean(libless_params_t *parameters) {
00050         EC_GROUP_free(parameters->group1);
00051         EC_GROUP_free(parameters->group2);
00052         EC_POINT_free(parameters->generator1);
00053         EC_POINT_free(parameters->generator2);
00054         EC_POINT_free(parameters->public);
00055         BN_free(parameters->pairing);
00056         BN_free(parameters->prime);
00057         BN_free(parameters->factor);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void libless_master_init(libless_master_t *master_key) {
00061         *master_key = NULL;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void libless_master_clean(libless_master_t *master_key) {
00065         BN_free(*master_key);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void libless_partial_init(libless_partial_t *partial_key) {
00069         *partial_key = NULL;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void libless_partial_clean(libless_partial_t *partial_key) {
00073         EC_POINT_free(*partial_key);
00074         *partial_key = NULL;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void libless_secret_init(libless_secret_t *secret) {
00078         *secret = NULL;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void libless_secret_clean(libless_secret_t *secret) {
00082         BN_free(*secret);
00083         *secret = NULL;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void libless_public_init(libless_public_t *public_key) {
00087         *public_key = NULL;
00088 }
00089 
00090 void libless_public_clean(libless_public_t *public_key) {
00091         BN_free(*public_key);
00092         *public_key = NULL;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void libless_private_init(libless_private_t *private_key) {
00096         libless_secret_init(&(private_key->secret));
00097         libless_partial_init(&(private_key->partial));
00098 }
00099 
00100 void libless_private_clean(libless_private_t *private_key) {
00101         libless_secret_clean(&(private_key->secret));
00102         libless_partial_clean(&(private_key->partial));
00103 }
00104 
00105 void libless_signature_init(libless_signature_t *signature) {
00106         signature->image = NULL;
00107         signature->hash = NULL;
00108         signature->hash_len = 0;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void libless_signature_clean(libless_signature_t *signature) {
00112         free(signature->image);
00113         free(signature->hash);
00114         signature->image = NULL;
00115         signature->hash = NULL;
00116         signature->hash_len = 0;
00117 }
